metadata.name: Panoramic Cappadocia-1
metadata.description:
Valley of the Swords

The valley, which is 15 minutes away from the center of Göreme, is on the left side of the Open Air Museum and directly opposite the road to Zemi Valley. Every corner of Cappadocia is striking, different and mysterious, not only does it have a magnificent backdrop, it also has a mystical atmosphere.

It is a photograph created by combining 12 vertical photographs.

Date                  : 19.01.2022
Camera            : Canon Eos 5D Mark3
Category          : Panoramic Landscape
Dimension       : 23438*7087 pxl
Resolution       : 300 Dpi ,  40.3 mb
Edition              : 1/1
File Extension : Jpeg
Location           : Göreme Nevşehir Turkey
